import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

answers = []

for i in range(n):
    answers.append(sys.stdin.readline().strip())

answers = answers[1:] + [answers[0]]

print(sum([a == b for a, b in zip(answers, "A"*n)]))

def main():
    n = int(input())
    answers = [input() for _ in range(n)]
    print(n-1)

main()
